name: Tense Sinker Ball
description:
If you enjoy playing baseball games, like sports and earning trophies, running away from enemies, Tense Sinker Ball is the right game for you.

This game is suited for all ages and it is presented with baseball characters. The goal of the game is to avoid enemies that want to stop your progress. The game has several levels of increasing difficulty and each level is unique. Start by tapping the screen and avoid enemies by moving side to side. When playing the game, you will notice trophies scattered all over the game field. These trophies are the game’s currency, which can be used to unlock other characters as follows:

Characters:

Fastballer: No coins needed to activate

Curveballer: 1000 coins to activate

Sliderballer: 1500 coins to activate

Knuckleballer: 2500 coins to activate

Sinkerballer: 5000 coins to activate

Useful Tips:

Occasionally you might find a helmet, which will make you invincible for a certain period of time.
A scoreboard keeps track of your progress at the end of each run.
Make sure to choose your favorite soundtrack before starting to play.
